title: Requires additional medicaid recipients throughout the state to participate in managed care plans
summary: Requires additional medicaid recipients throughout the state to participate in managed care plans; directs the commissioner of health to submit all appropriate waivers, state plan amendments, and federal applications to secure federal financial support.
